p.k: Wolf in Sheep's Clothing Detectives uncover the shocking truth behind the disappearance of an eight-year-old girl who was abducted close to her home in California
Cross-Dressed to Kill The shocking case of Kacy Kay Ray, who vanished after celebrating Christmas at her parents' home, only to be found dead days later in a field
82% Knock at the Door/The Brave One A woman is forced to watch when death comes calling at her fiance's door. A brave move ends in tragedy when a shooter flies off in a rage
82% The Lost Boys Detective John Brown races the clock when an innocent grandma is gunned down in Tulsa. Could teenagers be behind her tragic death?
Lieutenant Joe Kenda examines a case in which an army veteran is found bleeding to death in a car park
The Set-Up Kenda must launch a risky sting operation and an interstate manhunt when a hardworking family man stumbles into a downtown bar with a gunshot wound
Wolf in Sheep's Clothing Detectives uncover the shocking truth behind the disappearance of an eight-year-old girl who was abducted close to her home in California
82% Knock at the Door/The Brave One A woman is forced to watch when death comes calling at her fiance's door. A brave move ends in tragedy when a shooter flies off in a rage
78% Christopher Foster The brother of millionaire Christopher Foster joins those trying to understand why he killed his wife and daughter in Shropshire in 2008
Killing The Truth A wife vanishes after her husband moves his mistress into the family home. Ten years later, a yachting accident reveals the dark truth

n.u: Killer Forensics: Secrets of the Morgue

p.n: Killer Forensics: Secrets of the Morgue I (12)
p.k: Long Way From Home Series exploring high-profile murder cases from the perspective of the medical examiner, as they work alongside detectives to serve justice
Dead Weight A seemingly random attack that left a woman dead is investigated. New evidence and a cryptic note, however, reveal more to the case than initially suspected
Blood Trail A tiny clue leads investigators to the unlikely man behind the murder of 22-year-old Theresa Wesolowski, who was found stabbed 46 times in Germantown in 1999
Collateral Damage True crime documentary series following determined investigators as they piece together events during the critical 24-hour window after a crime
82% End of the Road It's a race against time for detectives in Tulsa when new evidence casts fresh light on an unsolved murder case
Sacrificial Lamb When 13-year-old PJ Grant is found dead from a single gunshot wound to the head, Lt Joe Kenda must determine whether it's suicide or murder
From gang shootings and drug busts to high-speed car chases and bar fights, this documentary series follows the tireless work of the US police force
From gang shootings and drug busts to high-speed car chases and bar fights, this documentary series follows the tireless work of the US police force
Family Affair Deandre Buchanan: In 2002, Deandre Buchanan was convicted of a triple homicide and, despite claiming he had a psychotic episode, he remains on death row

p.n: New: Live Pd: Police Patrol 7 VII (5)
p.k: New. Officers step in when a fight breaks out in a Rhode Island bar. Meanwhile, there's reckless driving in Georgia and a drugs bust goes down in South Carolina

p.n: New: Live Pd: Police Patrol 7 VII (6)
p.k: New. A situation in Texas throws officers into a violent stand-off. Police race to the scene of a car accident in Nevada and prepare for a drugs bust in Florida
82% The Grudge Every minute counts when an Alabama man is gunned down in cold blood. Could his troubled past have come back to haunt him?
My Step Dad Abused us for 12 Years Louise Turnbull from Gateshead, talks about the horrific abuse she suffered at the hands of her stepdad Albert Maughan
